experience.intro: I am an AI Full-Stack Software Engineer with a strong background in academic research, leadership, and professional work experience.

academic.title: Academic Background
details: B.S. in Computer Science, UC Berkeley
Relevant coursework: Machine Learning, Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems

leadership.title: Leadership Experience
details: President, AI Club at UC Berkeley
Led a team of 20+ students in AI research and hackathons

work.title: Work Experience
details: Enterprise AI Solutions Engineer, XYZ Corp (2022–Present): Developed and deployed AI-powered web applications for Fortune 500 clients.
Software Engineer Intern, ABC Tech (2021): Built scalable backend APIs and integrated ML models into production systems.

jobs.title: AI & ML Fullstack Software Engineer II
jobs.description:
Enterprise solutions engineering and software development in the federal space (DoD)
C3.AI Decision Advantage | C3.AI Contested Logistics
bullets: Partnered with project managers to prepare app features for demo flows and contributed to client meetings to discuss feature requirements
Agentic AI Agent Hackathon: Designed and developed an Agentic AI agent to streamline GitHub PR creation using C3 platform tools
Beta tested C3.AI Machine Learning Forecasting Project capstone course, provided key feedback, and earned completion certificate
Utilized time-series forecasting to predict wind turbine power output for 7 days, achieving 35% improvement over baseline model
Created end-to-end LightGBM pipeline on C3.AI platform, scored 100% capstone grade
Maintained end-to-end ownership of key features including proof of concepts, tech specs, development, and documentation:
Ingress/Egress RESTful API with OAuth2 authentication for secure data exchange
Import/Export Microsoft documents using Pandas for data manipulation and parsing
Real-time messaging system with chat history and user search functionality

jobs.title: Technical Specialist
bullets: Triaged hardware/software issues with iOS devices in client-facing role, performed diagnostics and produced technical documentation
Excelled in cross-functional team collaboration across different departments to deliver exceptional customer experiences

jobs.title: Software Engineer Team Lead
bullets: Led and supported growth of engineering team, bridging communication between engineers and executive leadership
Onboarded and guided 20+ new team members, streamlining onboarding systems and decreasing onboarding period by 60%
Screened potential candidates for engineering roles and conducted technical interviews, resulting in stronger new hires
Led sprint retrospectives and standup meetings as scrum master, along with demoing features to stakeholders

jobs.title: Public Relations Board Member / Social Media Coordinator
jobs.company: Chinese Student Association & Korean American Student Association
bullets: Delivered club updates at weekly general meetings to 50-100 members and led icebreaker activities
Expanded networks and partnerships two-fold by managing social media accounts and initiating strategic outreach
Raised hundreds of dollars in club funds through partnerships with local businesses like Poke House

skills.items: Python, JavaScript, React.js, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, JSON, SQL
APIs, GitHub Version Control, Terminal Environments, Jira, Clusters & Artifact Deployment, Python runtimes, Google Workstations
Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Large Language Models, Prompt Engineering, Hyperparameter Tuning, Pandas, Feature Engineering
Collaborative Leadership, Communication, Adaptability, Problem Solving, Time Management, Cross-functional Teamwork, Mentorship, Stakeholder Engagement, Technical Writing, Decision Making

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Nathan, a 24-year-old content creator based in the Bay Area, specializing in authentic lifestyle content that drives engagement and builds brand trust. My approach focuses on genuine storytelling that resonates with diverse audiences.
